Geothermal energy.Description: Geothermal energy is generated by geothermal power plants, which harness the heat from the Earth's core to produce electricity.
Geothermal energy is utilized by geothermal heat pumps, which use the stable temperature of the Earth to heat and cool buildings.
Geothermal energy is extracted from geothermal reservoirs, which are underground pockets of hot water and steam.
Geothermal energy is supported by geothermal energy associations, which promote the development and use of geothermal energy.
